item.description:
Join us for a Meet Up Dodgeball night! All athletic abilities are welcome to play. We will be playing against each other and having a fun time. We will be playing on a padded floor, wearing socks. The arena is air conditioned and is smaller than a typical dodgeball court. Dodgeball is a lot of fun, so be sure to join us. It doesn't matter if you haven't played since you were a kid, everyone is welcome to participate and have fun!

There is no fee to attend, but members are invited to donate between $5-10 at the door (cash only) to support the Not Me charity which provides self defense classes for Boston youth.

Please look for Catherine inside the entrance or on the dodgeball court, if you need help finding us, please call 774 232 0000.

This will be a joint event with other meet up groups.

IMPORTANT:
Please be sure to bring socks with you in order to play!

Dodgeball of Boston is located at Together in Motion, 1 Broadway in Arlington, at the intersection of Rte 16 and Broadway on the Arlington/Somerville line.
item.how_to_find_us: Please look for Catherine inside the entrance or on the dodgeball court, if you need help finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Fun Dodgeball Night at Dodgeball of Boston! All levels welcome!
